work.title: Final, Inc. Customer Dashboard
work.description: Developed the customer dashboard that allows Final's credit card holders to manage their accounts, make payments, etc. Created custom application development framework. Designed user experience and information architecture.

work.imgAlt: Screenshot of Final customer application page.
work.title: Final, Inc. Credit Card Application
work.description: Created a dynamic form application for collecting applicant data and account creation. Design work included site UX and responsive form UI.

work.imgAlt: Screenshot of Apps for Kids website.
work.title: Dassault Systèmes User Research
work.description: Worked as user researcher and prototyping engineer on year-long consulting project for Dassault Systèmes Solidworks. Conducted user research among Solidworks users, designed and prototyped mobile extensions to desktop CAD software. Prototypes later became "Capture It" and "Show It" software products under "Apps for Kids."

work.title: The Tessel Project
work.description: Worked as an intern on the open source Tessel Project. Created Javascript libraries for interacting with various hardware sensors and peripherals. Developed prototypes for OTA software updates and a universal protocol for remote sensor communication

work.title: Disney SyncLink
work.description: Developed an internal integrated hardware/software package to augment the Disney SyncLink platform. Created data pipeline for ETL and processing platform audit data.

work.title: Course Instructor / Curriculum Development - Olin College
work.description: Developed curriculum and co-taught courses in web application development, mobile application development, and introduction to programming in Python at Olin College of Engineering. Co-authored stand-alone version of web development course for self-directed learning.
